      • setDetailResultWriting

        public void setDetailResultWriting(Bundle bundle)
        This will cause the logging of entity changes and their changed fields. For example: Add User#5000000005 [px:5000000005] "Gregory 0003 House 0003" -UserSettings ->UserSettings#5000000005 -CreateUser ->User#5000000003 -UpdateUser ->User#5000000003 -Credential ->Credential#5000000005 -CreateTime ->'Wed May 14 18:15:13 PDT 2014' -BeanVersion ->'0' -UpdateTime ->'Wed May 14 18:15:13 PDT 2014' -Contact ->UserContact#5000000006 Update User#5000000004 [px:5000000004] "Gregory 0002 House 0002" -Department ->'New Department' -BeanVersion '0'->'1' -UpdateTime 'Wed May 14 18:15:13 PDT 2014'->'Wed May 14 18:15:13 PDT 2014'
        Parameters:
        bundle - the bundle to track
